qas.question: There is a great variety of what type of scripture?
Some schools venerate certain texts as religious what?

context: <a0_0>Buddhist<a0_0/> scriptures and other texts exist in great variety. Different schools of Buddhism place varying levels of value on learning the various texts. Some schools venerate certain texts as religious <a1_0>objects<a1_0/> in themselves, while others take a more scholastic approach. Buddhist scriptures are mainly written in Pāli, Tibetan, Mongolian, and Chinese. Some texts still exist in Sanskrit and Buddhist Hybrid Sanskrit.
